thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Bricks Acquisitions Announces Mandatory Squeeze-Out For Robyg's Shares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bricks Acquisitions Announces Mandatory Squeeze-Out For Robyg's Shares
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - ROBYG SA
* BRICKS ACQUISITIONS LIMITED ANNOUNCES MANDATORY SQUEEZE-OUT FOR 5,335,155 SHARES OF ROBYG REPRESENTING AROUND 1.84% OF ROBYG’S SHARE CAPITAL, SAYS INTERMEDIARY PEKAO INVESTMENT BANKING SA
* PURCHASE DATE IS SET FOR MARCH 7 * FOLLOWING ANNOUNCEMENT OF MANDATORY SQUEEZE-OUT WARSAW STOCK EXCHANGE DECIDES TO SUSPEND TRADING IN ROBYG’S SHARES AS OF TODAY
Source texts: bit.ly/2t5pvIc , bit.ly/2oJ2KnH
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
